title: Sexual violence against women and girls in Ethiopia's Tigray region amount to war crimes, Amnesty says
content:
1. Sexual violence against women and girls in Ethiopia's Tigray region amount to war crimes, Amnesty says  CNN
  2. How far will Ethiopia's PM go to fight rebels in Tigray? | Inside Story  Al Jazeera English
  3. Ethiopia using rape as a strategy in Tigray war - Amnesty  BBC News
  4. Opinion | Abiy's Tigray ceasefire is ended, and Ethiopia's war is only poised to worsen  The Washington Post
  5. The Guardian view on Ethiopia’s war: from very bad to worse  The Guardian

localize.title: エチオピアのティグライ地方における女性と少女への性的暴力は戦争犯罪に相当するとアムネスティが発表
大赦国际说，埃塞俄比亚提格雷地区针对妇女和女孩的性暴力相当于战争罪
大赦國際說，埃塞俄比亞提格雷地區針對婦女和女孩的性暴力相當於戰爭罪
